snippet: Tenant advocates and officials note that the regulations for New York City have lapsed before, with no dire consequences.
abstract: Some renters in New York City face uncertainty about potential large rent increases as state lawmakers fail to extend rent regulations; tenant advocates and city officials note that situation has happened before without any dire consequences.

byline.contributor: Michael M. Grynbaum and Colleen Wright contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Tenant advocates and officials note that the regulations for New York City have lapsed before, with no dire consequences.

headline.main: Expired Rent Regulation Rules Would Cause More Anxiety Than Chaos, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: Tenants Assured Little Will Change as Rules Lapse
